uphold.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to defend or support a law, system, or principle so that it continues to exist
uphold.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a committee that aims to uphold educational standards
uphold.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if a court upholds a decision made by another court, it states that the decision was correct
uphold.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The conviction was upheld by the Court of Appeal.
